entry.title: How to Submit MDG CR with auto approval for multiple customers in odata request
entry.content:
Requirement is to find the customers using VAT number (received using Odata service) and update field attribute 10 with hardcoded value. The CR will get auto approved.

There is an already existing CR for customer change which has got approval process associated with it.
How to achieve the requirement without hampering the existing process.
Please note sender system can send only the VAT number.

How to add custom generic fields for Ariba SLP to ... - SAP Community

entry.title: SAP Public Cloud 2508 / Errors during the Mass Creation of Business Partner Relationships
entry.content:
Hello Experts,
we have the following issue during the migration of 2000 Business Partner relationships.
We are using the app  "Manage Mass Creation Processes - BP Relationships (F6560A)" to import BP-Relationships for existing Business Partners.
We split the import into batches of 500, but if we try to activate these, then the system activates 100 of those and then gives the following error:
"User SAP_WFRT is processing the business partners relationship XY"
The error counter varies, if you reprocess the activation, sometimes it goes up one or two, then it drops down, till it activates another 100 entries. Eventually it activates all 500, so we were able to import the first batch. All of this takes a lot of time.

Our question is, is this standard behavior ? Can the tool only import 100 relationships at once and then needs time to process some stuff in the background ? 

We appreciate and advice on how to improve this process.
Best regards
Lukas

Thanks in advance!

entry.title: SAP Public Cloud 2508 / Mass Maintenance of Tax classification
entry.content:
Hello Experts,
i have the following issue. During the migration of customers, the information for the tax classification was filled incorrectly into the migration template and migrated with the migration cockpit
All entries consist of a country code, the tax category (mainly TTX1) and the tax classification (1 or 0). 
Because of an human error, many entries have a variety of country codes, when they all should only have one specific country code.
As a result none of these entries are displayed in the app "manage business partner master data" under the sales area section.

If i manually edit those business partners, i can add an entry with the correct country code, that overwrites the wrong entry that is not visible.
So far i have looked into the mass maintenance tool, but there i can only change the tax classification to a different value, but not the country code, which is the incorrect entry.
I also looked into the app "mass import of business partner master data", but there i get a message that the fields i want to import (correct) are alread filled.

The table that contains this data is called "KNVI".

My question is, is there way to do this correction in mass ? Can i update these entries with the migration cockpit or did i miss another option ?

Best regards 
Lukas

entry.content:

entry.title: How to register in MDG key mapping table
entry.content:
To link key codes registered in S/4HANA with key codes in peripheral systems, I would like to bulk register them in the MDG key mapping table using a CSV file.

The codes to be registered are item codes and business partner codes. In this case, I would like to know the mapping data structure of the input CSV file (what fields are required in the CSV file).

Next, we plan to create an add-on program that will register data in the MDG key mapping table using the ADD_MATCHING method of CL_MDG_ID_MATCHING_API_BS.

I would like to know what parameters are required when calling this class, since the values ​​for KeySchemaID and KeyAgencyID are managed internally by the system.

I need your help.

Thank you in advance.

ideally it to should open corresponding blocking standard CR automatically in change mode but it does not.

we are facing this issue only for a few group of users not for everyone. 

Any suggestion on how to solve this.

Thanks.

Custom FPM screen populated

entry.title: Auto extend plant to a material SAP MDG
entry.content:
My requirement is to auto extend a plant to a material CR

Background 

I am creating a follow-up cr where I want to auto add new plants when the CR is opened

i have written the code in system method caller badi as I am creating follow up cr by code

I have use Governance API but new plants are not getting added and there is no error as well.

And if I am making changes to existing data it is working fine but when I am trying to add new plant data it is not working

 

I tried to modify ct_data as well of plant feeder class but encountering same issue

please suggest

entry.title: Change request not created on API ProductMDMBulkReplicateRequest_In
entry.content:
Dear All

In view of our development task,  we are using SOAP API ProductMDMBulkReplicateRequest_In to get the material data from external system(non SAP).

First BC set MDGM_MDG_MATERIAL_CR_SOAP_09 activated and CR types MATL0I , MATL0U created, also decision tables configured.   Next SOAMANAGER and DRFIMG configured. 

Then executed sample payload and able to update the material fields and can see the ProductMDMBulkReplicateConfirmation_Out XML in SXI_MONITOR but   change request not created.

 

Debugged the API and see that go_mdg_mm_2_sta not bound, seems this is the reason for CR not created.

 

Am i missing anything here?  If so , could some one provide your inputs please.

 

regards

Chandra Kishore.

entry.title: SAP MDG Service Mapping Tools (SMT)
entry.content:
SAP MDG Service Mapping Tools (SMT)The service mapping tools (SMT) in SAP master data governance (MDG) is a framework use to define and manage data mapping between.

 

  1. Staging area structure
  2. Active area table
  3. Remote system or interface

Use :

  1. Replication or consolidation data between stating and active area.
  2. Map internal data structure to external system.
  3. Handle field name or mismatches between system.

 

 Configuration path :

Master Data Governance -> Classic Mode in SAP MDG -> Central Governance -> General Settings -> Data Modeling -> Generate Data Model-Specific Structure

SMT Mapping from Active Area :  Active area to staging area

SMT Mapping to Active Area: Staging area to active area

  1. Creating New field in ZAB_LFA1 structure : Industry Key (BRSCH)

  1. Creating Mapping for new field i.e. Industry Key :

Path: SMT-> Transformation Workbench -> Create and Edit Mappings

 

  • Source Structure: ZAB_LFA1
     This is a custom structure you created in Step 1 for supplier master data.
  • Target Structure: LFA1
     This is the standard SAP Vendor Master Table in ECC/S4HANA.
  • Mapping Step: ZMAP_HEADER
    This defines how fields from ZAB_LFA1 map to fields in LFA1.
  1. Need to map field one by one Source system to Target system

 

  • Select Source Structure (ZAB_LFA1) and Target Structure (LFA1).
  • For each field:
    1. Click on the source field (e.g., SUPPLIER_NO).
    2. Click on the target field (e.g., LIFNR)
    3. Click Map.

Repeat for all fields listed above.

Save and activate the mapping.

  1. Need to check Mapping:

Path: Transformation Workbench -> Check Customizing

 

  • check the mapping in SAP MDG and ensure there are no errors, you need to use the Transformation Workbench. Here’s the proper procedure
  1. If need we can add logic for source system to target system: (custom program)

Create custom program we will use T code SE38 here we will use standard class by SAP  CL_SMT_ENGINE.

Constructor and Executor methods in the Transformation Workbench

  • Methods Constructor:

Following Parameter are use.

  • Methods Workbench:

Following Parameter are use.

Source:

Target:

SAP Master Data Governance

entry.title: Reasigning material class 001 data for characteristic from class to class
entry.content:
Hello,

My customer uses many class assigned to material classification 001:

For that we have custom program that is printing the certificate data. Now we would like to exclude some of the characteristic from printing and we have created new class - NO_PRINT. The task is to reassign the characteristic from current ones to NO_PRINT, but without loosing the data in material masterdata. Is there a way to do it? We have over 500 materials that would be affected.

Thanks.

entry.content:

I’m working in SAP MDG and ran into a situation with the Relationship field. When I enter a Partner ID, instead of seeing the numeric value I expect, the field displays “Int. Num.”.

entry.title: Search Term should be mandatory in CR
entry.content:
Hi all,

I’m trying to make the “Search Term” field mandatory in a Change Request (CR) in SAP MDG. I’ve ticked the Required checkbox in the field properties, but the field is still not behaving as mandatory when creating a CR.  For reference, this is the SPRO path I followed to set the field as required:

Cross-Application Components->SAP Business Partner->Business Partner->Basic Settings->Field Groupings->Configure Field Attributes per BP Role

My goal here is that the Search Term1 field should be mandatory when the role is FLVN01.

entry.title: SAP MDG – Partner ID field shows “Int Number” instead of selected ID
entry.content:
Hello experts,

I am working as an SAP MDG technical consultant and I am facing a strange behavior in an MDG UI (FPM).

In a relationship assignment screen, I have a Partner ID field with a search help.
From the search help, I select a valid partner (numeric BP ID). However, after selection, the Partner ID field is filled with the text “Int. Numer” instead of the actual partner number.

i mentioned in screenshot

i need your support
